full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/17/2023 AFFIDAVIT I, JUAN TORRES, of legal age, divorced, specialized mechanic and residing at 13324 S.W. 113 Ct., Miamim, Florida 33176, after being duly sworn, depose and say: 1.- - THAT I entered to this country on March 26th, 1980 where I requested for political asylum, which has been already granted to me. 2. - THAT I have a good economical position as you can see in my W-2 Forms attached to this affidavit. 3. - THAT I have been the support to my mother, MELIDA AMAYA CHAVEZ, since she entered to this country on May 11, 1980 and I will continue supporting her. 4. - THAT I can state herewith that she has resided continuosly with me since she entered this country and that she will continue residing with me at 13324 S.W. 113 Ct. , Miami, Florida 33176. 5. - THAT if you have any question, do not hesitate to contact the Affiant. IN WITNESS WHEREOF I have hereunto set my hands at the city of Miami, Dade County on this 21st day of May, 1987. JUAN TORRES SWORN TO AND SUBSCRIBED BEFORE ME ON THIS 21st. DAY OF MAY, 1987. NOTARY PUBLIC State of Florida at Large My Commission Expires: Notary Public, State of Florida at Carge My Commission Expires Dec. 6, 1987
